overview: Mark Haseltine brings more than twenty years of experience to his position as NameMediaâ€™s CTO, having successfully built and scaled technology organizations at several fast-growing companies. Mark joined NameMedia from Gerson Lehrman Group, a professional services firm where he led the global technology organization as revenues tripled and more than 20 offices were opened worldwide. Prior to this, Mark was at Context Media, a leading provider of enterprise content integration software and services, where he was vice president of products. Previously, Mark served as an executive team founding member and Vice President of Engineering at AltaVista Software, a division of AltaVista Company. His responsibilities at AltaVista included building and managing the team that developed the search Web site. Prior to AltaVista, he served as a development director for Oracle Corporation where he spearheaded development efforts in CRM and E-Commerce product areas. Mark holds a BS in Computer Science and Engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology and a MS in Computer Science from Stanford University.
